attributes.additional_details:
The current strikes by public sector workers to defend their pensions doesn't reflect the majority who are paying higher taxes and so having to reduce their own pension payments to subsidise those in the public sector who don't wish to pay fairly for their pensions
This petition calls for reduction in public sector pensions so that taxes can be reduced so that private sector workers can have a pension to match that of the public sector.
All receive a fair and equal pension
